ygData.subject: Re: Alpha Dolphy/help to Azure Blade
ygData.msgSnippet: If he would have chosen to go back with you then he would have made the wrong choice. Megatron turned his back on Alpha, ignoring the battle field. Sentient

"If he would have chosen to go back with you then he would have made the
wrong choice." Megatron turned his back on Alpha, ignoring the battle
field. "Sentient beings tend to make poor decisions, perhaps you belong
with your friend," Megatron turned his head and smiled, "on this side."
